name: Boostathon
description:
-Boostathon-

This game was created for the ludwig game jam, the inspiration was taken from the rocket seen in ludwig's subathon. 

The goal is to get your rocket to the twitch prime crown located at the top of the map. You will face the risk of extreme frustration as you make your way up. 

All in all a lot of fun to make, feedback is appreciated :)
